name: Boy, you are out of control
name_original: Boy, you are out of control
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 The theme was "out of control"
  • Top Down shooter, where your WASD keys are your health
  •  Lost a key and you can't move in this direction, until you get it back
Controls
  • Esc -> quit game
  • WASD -> move 
  • Left Mouse Button -> shoot
Lore

Your are a gamer, who want to keep playing and defeat the real life necessities. Kill your hunger, kill your tiredness, kill your work and keep playing!!!!
